arts.ttl: Juve boss slams 'shameful' attitude after cup exit
arts.sum: Empoli knocked Juventus out of the Coppa Italia with a dramatic 4-2 penalty shootout win after a 1-1 draw in regular time, leaving coach Thiago Motta ashamed by the Bianconeri's shock exit.

arts.ttl: Vlahovic miss costs Juve in Cup shootout exit
arts.sum: Empoli beat Juventus 4-2 on penalties to advance to the Coppa Italia semi-finals on Wednesday after a resilient performance helped them hold the defending champions to a 1-1 draw in regular time.
